reactor.bus.selector

Class Selectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.bus.selector.Selectors
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetSelectors

    public abstract class Selectors
extends Object
    Helper methods for creating Selectors.
    Author:
    Andy Wilkinson, Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini

      • type

        public static ClassSelector type(Class<?> supertype)
        Creates a Selector based on the given class type that matches objects whose type is assignable according to Class.isAssignableFrom(Class).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The new ClassSelector.
